div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Specimen|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Specimen` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Specimen`. Element `Specimen` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.accessionIdentifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.accessionIdentifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.status`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.type`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Specimen.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Specimen.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.subject`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.receivedTime` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.receivedTime`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.parent` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.parent`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.request` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.request`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Specimen.combined` has a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.role` has a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.feature` has a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.

Element `Specimen.feature.description` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Specimen.feature` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Specimen.feature.description` has a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
